input.name: __VIEWSTATE

img.alt: Readng with the Cats night group photo
The front entrance of Trimble Elementary Middle School

p.span: To all parents who have students participating in the Washington D.C trip: I know there are a lot of questions about our last payment, fundraisers, and the trip in general. We are currently working with our travel agency to reschedule our D.C. Trip to occur later in the fall - specifically November after the regular fall sports season ends. However, dates are not yet solidified. Once we have an updated contract with our vendors and travel agency, we will share the solidified dates with you. Flower bulb fundraisers: We will make individual calls to students who participated in this fundraiser to organize pick up dates and times to distribute those orders safely. Candy/Snack fundraiser: We will be in contact once the stay at home order has been lifted. Please hold onto your money collection until further notice. Final Payment Deadline: The final payment deadline will be announced once we have confirmed dates for our trip. If you have additional questions, please feel free to email Mrs. Ecklund or Ms. Sharp. You can also call the school office during open office hours and they can forward your call to Mrs. Ecklund and Ms. Sharp. Thank you for your patience, as there have been many changes during uncharted times. We will continue to update you as soon as more information becomes available.

div.span: One Tomcat Drive | Glouster, OH 45732 | Phone: (740) 767-4444 | Fax: (740) 767-4901

MISSION: The mission of the Trimble Local Schools is to work together for excellence in student achievement.
DISCLAIMER: If any of the material on this page is not accessible to you or you have questions, please send us an email or call us via our contact page and we will provide alternatives.
